title: Low priority Que Because of Rads Error
body:
So I get Rads Error like everyone else yesterday Right when the match was about to start cant connect again I connect today and bam low priority Que because of Rads error this is rude 20 min wait before every game that's not fair.....its not fair to everyone else who received the same restriction as me for the same reason plz remove this. in game name. Po0n Slayer ty. 

p.s I had also just payed for the new blood moon thresh skin and then I get banned for an error on your side that makes me feel cheated.

replies.body:
>like everyone else yesterday

Not everyone is experiencing this. It's mostly Mac players.

The error is probably theirs, but they are unlikely to revoke your leave marker. This is because there's no way to tell the difference between you being afk and your game failing to start/crashing.

Edit: By "theirs" I'm referring to Riot, not Mac users.
